mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_MOVIEINFO (TITLE, STARRING, GENRE, SUMMARY, POSTER, THUMBNAIL, STILLCUT, WRITER) VALUES (#{title}, #{starring}, #{genre}, #{summary}, #{poster}, #{thumbNail}, #{stillCut}, #{writer} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_MOVIEINFO SET TITLE=#{title}, STARRING=#{starring}, GENRE=#{genre}, SUMARRY=#{summary}, POSTER=#{poster}, THUMBNAIL=#{thumbNail}, STILLCUT=#{stillCut}
mapper.select: select id, title, regDate from tbl_movieinfo
select id, title, summary, regDate from tbl_movieinfo where id = #{id}
